programme.title: Cosmic Journeys

programme.title: Cosmic Journeys
programme.desc: There are plans to send spacecraft to the Moon to find resources that may one day allow humans to live there.

programme.title: Cosmic Journeys

programme.desc: Learn about black holes, the mysteries surrounding them, their origin, and what lies within and beyond them.

programme.desc: Through satellite monitoring and supercomputer simulations, see the Sun affect systems that shape our climate.

programme.title: Secrets of the Universe

programme.title: Secrets of the Universe
programme.desc: Some stars are as old as time. Experience their beauty and power, from birth to their waning and final stages.

programme.title: Secrets of the Universe
programme.desc: Scientists identified planets close to Earth's size. Our perspective on our place in the cosmos is shifting.

programme.title: Secrets of the Universe
programme.desc: Follow the era of space exploration, from Sputnik through lunar landings to today's private space flights.

programme.sub-title: The Value of Species Diversity Part 1: Ethiopia

programme.sub-title: Vanilla: The Hunt for the Brown Gold

programme.desc: An Indian state in the Himalayas has completely transformed its agriculture and switched to organic farming.

programme.title: Polar World
programme.desc: After the Arctic cold loosens its grip, polar bears emerge. Cubs are keen to explore their new surroundings.

programme.title: Exploring Venus
programme.desc: The surface of Venus is 95% carbon dioxide with an atmospheric pressure equivalent to 900 meters underwater.

programme.title: Exploring Venus
